DOC.brief_summary: The study aim investigate influence 5 cupping massage treatment chronic non specific neck pain . 50 patient neck pain randomised cupping treatment wait list control group . Before intervention investigator evaluate neck pain ( VAS ) , neck related disability ( NDI ) , pain movement ( POM ) quality life ( SF36 ) safety . To investigate neurophysiological effect cup investigator also measure mechanical detection threshold ( MDT ) , vibration detection threshold ( VDT ) pressure pain threshold ( PPT ) two point discrimination threshold pain related control area . The treatment group receive 5 cupping treatment period 3 week .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Cupping Massage Patients With Chronic Neck Pain - A Randomized Controlled Trial
